alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued January 29 at 3:07PM HST until January 31 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF LANAI AND THE BIG ISLAND UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI FROM 6 AM HST TUESDAY THROUGH 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... .Several pulses of west-northwest (300 degrees) swell will arrive over the next couple of days. A medium-period swell today will be followed by a larger swell arriving tonight into Tuesday that will produce advisory to near warning level Tuesday through Tuesday night. This swell will then gradually diminish on Wednesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 18 to 22 feet along north facing shores, and 12 to 18 along west facing shores on Tuesday. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, and Molokai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Heed all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Molokai North; Molokai West; Molokai Windward; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast
